nodes.text: Puff-pie was a rich dessert made with fattening cream. In 20 BBY, the surgeon Uli compared choosing between right and wrong to choosing whether or not to eat a cream-fat puff-pie that ought to be skipped. His friend, the Jedi Padawan Barriss Offee, noted that gorging on dessert could not be fairly compared to evildoing on a galactic scale. Uli responded that perhaps it depended on the dessert in question.
Puff-pie was mentioned in MedStar II: Jedi Healer, a novel written by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry as the second book in the MedStar Duology.
